Why We Started

In today's noisy and restless AI era, we've chosen to start over‚Äîwith a few small, meaningful creations. We believe that technology should enhance human connection with the world around us, not overwhelm it.

That's why we focus on creating thoughtful, purposeful applications that help people rediscover the wonder, beauty, awe, and sometimes the sorrow of this world we share.
